meanings.definition: To engage in excessive eating or drinking.
meanings.sent1: After school, she started binging on cookies and milk.
meanings.sent2: He couldn't stop binging on chips while watching TV.
meanings.sent3: The cat was binging on tuna so much, it started meowing for more.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was binging on worries like a never-ending buffet of anxiety.
meanings.sent5: The image of him binging on ice cream was etched in her memory.

meanings.definition: A period of excessive indulgence in an activity, especially eating or drinking.
meanings.sent1: During the holidays, she went on a binging spree with chocolates.
meanings.sent2: The weekend turned into a binging fest of movies and popcorn.
meanings.sent3: The binging on video games left him with no time for homework.
meanings.sent4: The binging on social media was like drowning in a sea of endless scrolling.
meanings.sent5: The binging on novels made her feel like she was living in different worlds.
